pullRequest.bodyText:
We were allowing anything without an explicit column reference, which

General Changes

Fix constant analysis for prepared statement parameters

included SELECT * from table and SELECT 1 from table.  Now only

nodes.bodyText: I thought we want to do all these kinds of things on RowExpression? Note that Core SQL is imminent and we will have yet another AST - for better or worse - so it will be best if we don't do more things using the current Expression API.

Also, I see another similar class:
presto-main/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/sql/analyzer/ConstantExpressionVerifier.java
Can we use that?

commit.message:
Only allow constants in prepared statement parameters

We were allowing anything without an explicit column reference, which
included SELECT * from table and SELECT 1 from table.  Now only
expressions that reference neither tables nor columns (nor *) will be
allowed.

Clean up parameters related code

Remove unused arguments being passed around, use ImmutableSet instead of
empty set, and have constructors delegate.
